SubHeaders.Title: Psychosis Defined
SubHeaders.InfoDump:
Started as a hobby project during the 2020 pandemic to learn Vulkan and to improve my C++, WinApi, and Mathematic skills. The game is a top-down 2D rougelite, borrowing elements from building games like Terraria and Minecraft and rougelike elements from games like Shopkeeper and Risk Of Rain. game loop is to delve, fight new enemies, craft unique items, upgrade and customize your home base.

Cooking Innana

Made during the pandemic as a challenge to program every day for 100 days and this was the result, A 3D application that taught me a lot about graphics programming using open-gl and c++

SubHeaders.Title: Assorted Python
SubHeaders.infoDump: Quick applications made using Python. Ranging from testing out some ideas before implementing them in a larger project to handy tools I made to help me with other projects.
